about_the_game:
This demo represents Good Heavens! at its Alpha Stage. Some of the content and features (including online coop) are missing.

It is limited for a single island with two biomes.

The demo should still give you an overall idea where the game is heading towards with different tech trees, interesting monsters and quests. We're expecting a 1 hour playtime.

This is the first public version of the game and we will be updating this demo build along with the main game. We really want your feedback to make Good Heavens! the craziest Openworld Survival Crafting RPG so stop reading this, play the demo and tell us what you think.
